solution.text:
Draw the base of the rectangle of length \(_{k}_\,cm\).
On both ends, construct an angle of \(90^\circ\).
Now, draw perpendicular from both ends of length \(_{j}_\,cm\).
Join the two edges.
Finally, connect the diagonal points and measure the diagonal using a ruler.
The length of the diagonal should be \(_{{trunc(((j**2+k**2)**(1/Decimal(2))),2)}}_\,cm\)

content.text: Construct a rectangle with adjacent sides \(_{j}_\,cm\) and \(_{k}_\,cm\). Once constructed, use a ruler to measure the diagonal. What is the length of the diagonal?
